name: Cheetah X, Inc.
description: Provider of an electronic scooter-sharing service intended to help users travel within cities. The company's scooters are capable of going up to twenty-five mph and a full day on a single charge, enabling customers to travel locally in a faster, cheaper, and environmentally friendly manner.
